page.title: 14 SIKHISM
page.content: MY FAMILY ARE SIKHS.WE FOLLOW A RELIGION CALLED SIKHISM.THE SIKH TEMPLE IS IN CLARENCE PLACE.WE CALL IT A GURDWARA.ANYONE CAN GO TO IT ANY TIME OFTHE DAY.WE GO ON SUNDAY AT 5.30pm.WE TAKE OUR SHOES OFF AND COVER OUR HEADS WITH A SCARF.MEN WEAR A TURBAN.WE GO IN QUIETLY WE BOW LOW BEFORE THE HOLY BOOK CALLED GURU GRANTH SAHIB.IT IS ON A PLATFORM COVERED BY SILK SCARVES AND BELOW A CANOPY.WE SIT ON THE FLOOR. LADIES AND YOUNG CHILDREN SIT ON ONE SIDE,MEN AND OLDER BOYS ON THE OTHER. WE ALL SIT ON THE FLOOR BECAUSE WE ARE ALL EQUAL IN THE EYES OF GOD.WE LISTEN TO HYMS SUNG BY 2-3 MEN.THIS IS CALLED KIRTAN.AT CERTAIN TIMES WE STAND UP TO SAY PRAYERS CALLED ARDAS.ALL WHO ARE PRESENT ARE EXPECTED TO EAT A SMALL PORTION OF KARAH PRASAD.IT IS MADE OF FLOUR,SUGAR AND CLARIFIED BUTTER.
